snippet: In its program “The Phoenix Rising,” the early-music group Stile Antico paid tribute to the 1920s compendium “Tudor Church Music.”
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews performance by British vocal ensemble Stile Antico at the Church of St Mary the Virgin.
lead_paragraph: In its program “The Phoenix Rising,” the early-music group Stile Antico paid tribute to the 1920s compendium “Tudor Church Music.”

headline.seo: Stile Antico Pays Tribute to ‘Tudor Church Music’
headline.main: Bringing Vocal Life to a Scholarly Endeavor
headline.print_headline: Bringing Vocal Life to a Scholarly Endeavor
